summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6122 for the improvement of West Walker Street from 47th Avenue Southwest to 50th Avenue Southwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84949 as amended by Ordinance No. 84998, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
